title: How to contact Riot Game?
body:
Hello,

How do I go about contact Riot Games (not the support for league) I want to make an official complaint. League of legend support staff don't seem to take complaints seriously or they just ignore you.

Thanks

replies.body: Hey there, is there something I might be able to help with?  If you have concerns or suggestions for the game, the[ gameplay boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance) may be your best bet to share it with devs and community.  Otherwise, you can reach out to us anytime via a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) f you're having a game issue.

but thanks anyway

Hey there Riot games, umm I have a very big issue. It is really big please I need help I am in low priority queue  for 20 minuets that is meant to last 5 games and it’s been over 180 minuets and I have not gotten into a game. Please Riot what’s going on. Is this some form of bug am really worried.
And I emailed Riot support 2 times during the space of the 180 minuets and am still in queue. Do you by any chance have customer care line I would love to speak to someone. It’s really troubling me.
